Changelog for paab.policy

    (Roberto Allende - rover at menttes.com)

paab.policy - 0.2 

    - New views for collections and folder content types
      
    - Automatic category selection and automatic collections creation for blog sections

    -  Humane blogging, a set of customization for easy blog publishing


paab.policy - 0.1 

    - Initial package structure.
      [zopeskel]
